explains: n. 反光面，（夜间光线照射后能反光的）反光玻璃（或塑料），反光体，反光罩；反射式望远镜
wordGroup: parabolic reflector 抛物面反射器
reflex reflector 反射器，回复反射器

sentences.en: In 1975 the Chinese installed the first survey beacon on Everest, a red reflector visible through a theodolite for ten miles, as a reference point.
sentences.cn: 1975年，中国在珠穆朗玛峰上安装了第一个测量信标，这是一个红色的反射器，可作为参考点，通过经纬仪可以在10英里外看到。

sentences.en: Most antennas are made in the shape of a dish to collect and reflect the radio waves to the sub reflector, in the same way as a curved mirror focuses visible light to one point.
sentences.cn: 大多数天线被制成碟形，用以收集和反射无线电波至亚反射器，就像曲面镜将可见光聚焦于一点一样。

sentences.en: The reflector is held onto the sides of the spacecraft with a frame.
sentences.cn: 反光器被一个框紧紧地固定在宇宙飞船的各个侧面。
